title: 游戏崩溃
txt_content:
各位大佬，我的文件夹里没有mods文件夹，有人说要下载forge，我下载了一个1.7.10版的可一开始，游戏就崩溃，以下是日志（新人有点穷，最多只有30金粒）：18:02:02.899[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.configureForClientLaunch(FMLLaunchHandler.java:34)

18:02:02.899
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:126)

18:02:02.899
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:115)

18:02:02.900
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)

18:02:02.900
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]: Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.IFMLLoadingPlugin

18:02:02.900
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:191)

18:02:02.900
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:424)

18:02:02.910
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:357)

18:02:02.910
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         ... 23 more

18:02:02.910
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]: Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException

18:02:02.911
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:182)

18:02:02.911
[java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         ... 25 more

18:02:02.940


18:02:02.940
Process crashed with exit code 1

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
重新安装一遍Forge呢

或者用这里的整合包吧

[1.15.2-1.7.10]能力整合-Forge/FabricAPI下的基础整合[持续更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
我下载了一个1.7.10版的Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.IFMLLoadingPlugin
整合包谁发给你的，里面还有适用于1.8+的Mod。将其删除。
